3044.verse: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?

3045.verse: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.

3046.verse: And I am not one to drive away the believers.

3047.verse: I am only a clear warner."

3048.verse: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."

3049.verse: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.

3050.verse: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."

3051.verse: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.

3052.verse: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.

3053.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3054.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3056.verse: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

3057.verse: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

3058.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3059.verse: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

3060.verse: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,

3061.verse: And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?

3062.verse: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.

3063.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3064.verse: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,

3065.verse: Provided you with grazing livestock and children

3067.verse: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

3068.verse: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.
